title: AI Feature Rollout Strategy
shortDescription: Plan phased rollout for AI features with shadow mode, confidence ramps, and human-in-the-loop transitions.

inputs.label: Current Process
inputs.example: Manual data entry by AP clerks, 15 min per invoice, 5% error rate

inputs.label: User Segments
inputs.example: Enterprise customers (100+ users), Mid-market (10-100 users), SMB (<10 users)

inputs.label: Risk Tolerance
inputs.example: Low - financial data, errors cause payment delays and compliance issues

inputs.label: Success Metrics
inputs.example: Accuracy >95%, user adoption >70%, processing time <2 min, user satisfaction >4.0/5

inputs.label: Timeline Constraints
inputs.example: Q2 launch target, must be stable before month-end processing peaks
